Format ae_format48_3 - 48 bit(s) 0 1110
AE_MOVDA16 1001110111 1001
ae_fld_ar_to_dr_v 3210
s 3210

Assembler Syntax

AE_MOVDA16 aed0..15(ae_ar_to_dr_v), a0..15(ars)

C Syntax

#include <xtensa/tie/xt_hifi2.h>

extern ae_int16x4 AE_MOVDA16(unsigned a);

Description

AE_MOVDA16 copy the 16-bit contents of a into each of the four 16-bit elements of an AE_DR register d.

Implementation Pipeline

In Out
ars Mstage ae_ar_to_dr_v Mstage

Protos that use AE_MOVDA16

proto AE_MOVDA16 { out ae_int16x4 d, in uint32 a }{}{
AE_MOVDA16 d, a;
}
proto AE_MULS16S_scalar { out int32 aout, in int32 ain, in int16 var1, in int16 var2 }{ae_int16x4 t1, ae_int16x4 t2, ae_int32x2 t3, ae_int32x2 t4, ae_int32x2 t5}{
AE_MOVDA16 t1, var1;
AE_MOVDA16 t2, var2;
AE_MOVDA32 t3, ain;
AE_MUL16X4 t5, t4, t1, t2;
AE_SUB32S t3, t3, t4;
AE_MOVAD32.L aout, t3;
}
proto AE_SRLA16_scalar { out int16 aout, in int16 var1, in int32 var2 }{ae_int16x4 t1, ae_int32x2 t2}{
AE_MOVDA16 t1, var1;
AE_CVT32X2F16.10 t2, t1;
AE_SRLA32 t2, t2, var2;
AE_MOVAD16.1 aout, t2;
}
proto ae_int32_rtor_ae_int16u { out ae_int16u a, in ae_int32 b }{int32 t}{
AE_MOVAD32.L t, b;
AE_MOVDA16 a, t;
}
proto ae_int32u_rtor_ae_int16 { out ae_int16 a, in ae_int32u b }{int32 t}{
AE_MOVAD32.L t, b;
AE_MOVDA16 a, t;
}
proto ae_int32u_rtor_ae_int16u { out ae_int16u a, in ae_int32u b }{int32 t}{
AE_MOVAD32.L t, b;
AE_MOVDA16 a, t;
}
proto int16_rtor_ae_f16 { out ae_f16 d, in int16 a }{}{
AE_MOVDA16 d, a;
}

}
